VICTIM ADVOCATE
Professional Summary
Â Social worker with more that five years ofÂ experience asÂ Multicultural VictimÂ Â Advocate and exceptional people skills. Versed in advocacy andÂ case management . Desires a challenging
role as HR Generalist.Â Â Strategic planning and client relationship management expert. Experience in counseling individuals of various ethnic and socio-economic backgrounds, including Latinos
and immigrants from various countries.
